summary: This is an internal email chain from July 2, 2020, congratulating a team on the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell that morning. The emails highlight that the charges were not inevitable but the result of extensive work, and note an upcoming press conference.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the emails; her arrest is announced and she is described as 'a woman very worthy of criminal prosecution.'

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested this morning, leading to internal congratulations within the prosecuting team.

events.title: Press Conference on Maxwell Case
events.description: A press conference is scheduled for 12:00 on the day of the arrest to discuss the case.

events.title: Internal Team Call
events.description: A call was held on Tuesday (two days prior to the arrest) where the case and the team's work were discussed.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on the morning of July 2, 2020.
The charges against Maxwell were described as not inevitable but the result of 'extraordinary amount of work and perseverance and creativity' by a prosecution team.
The conduct forming the basis of the case is noted as being very old, potentially older than the team's paralegals.
A press conference regarding the arrest was scheduled for 12:00 on July 2, 2020.
